title: Anyone else see this?
content:
So I came to the PCKF and I saw in the Miscellaneous section that there was an unread thread. So I opened it up only to find that there was no unread thread.

Odd...

I figured that KeenRush probably just deleted a spam thread or something. So I went back to the main page and I happened to glance over at moderators bar.

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/WhereistheKeenRush.png[/img]

What happened to Keen Rush and Xtraverse? And why are there no moderators for the Miscellaneous Polls or The Theater? Is my computer just acting weird or do other people see this as well?

Edit: Changed "is" to "are"-----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Blegdandsmeegdbanner60copy.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Anyone else see this?
content: Someone posted a thread advertising something and it was deleted. I dunno about the moderator thing.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: hmmm
content:
Aside from what Allstories suggested, there's a couple other cases. If a new post is made in a topic which is moved to another forum, you may get the "new post" alert in the wrong place...

Also, sometimes EzBoard will log you out when you access a forum--check to make sure it says "My Profile" and not "Login" up at the top! :-)

title: *shrugs*
content:
I got the phantom post earlier too, and there were no other forums with unread posts at the time. Either a topic was removed or it's just another of ezBoard's quirks.

The moderators are also missing on my end. Dunno what that means. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: *shrugs*
content: I changed KeenRush to a global moderator, I dunno why it doesn't display him anymore.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: *shrugs*
content:
Cool, thanks xtra! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Shikadi Soda for everyone!
Didn't notice until now, so it is probably that the change has been made while I was temporarily unaware, in other words, sleeping.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: *shrugs*
content: I also often seem to find topics unexpectedly marked as having new messages, but it almost always is in a poll forum - so I think when someone votes that's enough to mark the topic as unread, even if they didn't post a message.

title: Re: *shrugs*
content:
There's always a few bugs in every program...~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: *shrugs*
content:
No; there's always an infinite number of unanticipated bugs and potential errors in any program.

KeenRush global now?
